00003 cParticleSystem::cParticleSystem(unsigned numberofparticles) : iObject() {
00004

00006         GLfloat sp[3] = {0,0,0};

00027 void cParticleSystem::init() {
00028         init(particles.size(), position, velocity, velocityrandomness, liferandomness, force, colour);

00031 
00032 void cParticleSystem::init(unsigned numberofparticles, GLfloat startposition[3], GLfloat nvelocity[3], 
00033                            GLfloat nvelocityrandomness, GLfloat nliferandomness, GLfloat nforce[3], GLfloat ncolour[3]) {
00034                                 
00035     for (int i=0; i<3; i++) { 
00036                 position[i] = startposition[i];
00037                 velocity[i] = nvelocity[i];
00038                 force[i] = nforce[i];
00039                 colour[i] = ncolour[i];
00040         } 
00041         
00042         velocityrandomness = nvelocityrandomness;
00043         liferandomness = nliferandomness;
00044     defaulttexture = new cTexture("data/fuzzy1.png");
00045         
00046         list<cParticle*>::iterator it = particles.begin();
00047         
00048         for (unsigned i=0;i<numberofparticles;i++) {
00049                 
00050                 particles.push_back(NULL); // add a space for a particle
00051                 
00052                 // go to the new particle
00053                 it = particles.begin(); for (unsigned j=0;j<i;j++) it++; // surely there's a better way than this. 
00054                                                                          // Maybe I need a vector instead of a list - 
00055                                                                          // fast inserts/deletes aren't as needed as I thought.
00056                 // init the new particle
00057                 initparticle(it);
00058                 
00059         }
00060                 
00061 }
00062 
00063 void cParticleSystem::update() {
00064         
00065         for (list<cParticle*>::iterator it=particles.begin(); it!=particles.end(); it++) {
00066         
00067                 for (int i=0;i<3;i++) (*it)->velocity[i] += force[i];
00068                 (*it)->update();
00069                 //if ((*it)->deleteme == true) initparticle(it); //reincarnate the particle
00070                 if ((*it)->deleteme == true) it = particles.erase(it); // let particle die.
00071         }
00072         
00073 }
00074 
00075 void cParticleSystem::draw() {
00076         
00077         for (list<cParticle*>::iterator it=particles.begin(); it!=particles.end(); it++) {
00078                 
00079                 (*it)->draw();
00080                 
00081         }
00082         
00083 }

00086 void cParticleSystem::initparticle(list< cParticle* >::iterator it) {
00087         
00088         cParticle* tmpparticle;
00089          cTexture* default_texture = new cTexture("data/fuzzy1.png");
00090         float randconst;
00091         Uint32 life = 2000;
00092         
00093         GLfloat nvelocity[3];
00094         
00095         
00096         srand(time(NULL)+rand());
00097         for (int j=0;j<3;j++) {
00098                 
00099                 randconst = ((float)rand()/(float)RAND_MAX) * velocityrandomness - velocityrandomness/2;
00100         
00101                 nvelocity[j] = velocity[j] + randconst;
00102         
00103         }
00104         
00105         randconst = ((float)rand()/(float)RAND_MAX) * liferandomness - liferandomness/2;
00106         life += life*randconst;
00107         
00108         tmpparticle = new cTexturedParticle(position, nvelocity, life, default_texture);
00109         
00110         (*it) = tmpparticle;
00111         
00112 }
